item.title: The U.S. SEC and CFTC have issued a joint statement clarifying that registered exchanges in the U.S. are not prohibited from offering certain spot cryptocurrency transactions.
item.description: On September 3rd, the staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) have just put forth a joint statement. It is clearly stated that exchanges registered with the SEC and CFTC are not banned from providing trading services for certain spot crypto asset products.SEC Chairman Paul Atkins remarked, "Market participants should have the freedom to decide where to trade spot crypto assets."CFTC Acting Chair Caroline Pham said, "During the previous administration, our agencies sent inconsistent signals regarding the regulation and compliance issues in the digital asset market. However, the message conveyed was very distinct: innovation was not welcomed. That era has come to an end."This move represents an important step for the "Crypto Project" and "Crypto Sprint" initiatives of the two agencies. The purpose is to coordinate regulation while expanding trading venue options and flexibility for U.S. market participants.

item.title: Ethereum Foundation to Sell 10,000 ETH to Support Development and Other Work
item.description: On September 3rd, the Ethereum Foundation announced in a blog post that in the coming few weeks, it will be converting 10,000 ETH by using a centralized exchange in order to continuously support its research, grants, and donation endeavors. This conversion will be carried out through multiple small transactions instead of a single large transaction.

item.title: Trump: If Tariff Decision is Unfavorable, Will Have to Return Trillions of Dollars
item.description: On September 3rd, US President Trump stated, "If the tariff appeal is rejected, I will have no choice but to withdraw the tariff. If the tariff ruling is unfavorable to us, we will be compelled to refund trillions of dollars. The tariff ruling lacks legal foundation. If the tariffs are cancelled, we may ultimately end up as a third-world country." (FX168)

item.title: Apple's AI Talent Continues to Decline as Head of Robotics Research Defects to Meta
item.description: On September 3rd, as per foreign media reports, the lead of Apple's (AAPL.O) AI robot research has resigned and joined Meta Platforms (META.O), which represents the latest instance of talent loss in AI at the company. Meta confirmed on Tuesday that Jian Zhang has joined its Robotics Lab.According to sources, three other AI researchers are also scheduled to leave Apple's internal large language model team. The recent wave of resignations that took place last week is said to have included John Peebles, Nan Du, and Zhao Men. These individuals all come from Apple's base model team, and around 10 members have resigned from this team in recent weeks, including the team lead. This team is a crucial force in developing Apple's AI platform, which was launched last year as a significant step for the company to keep up with the AI trend. (Jinse)

item.title: Bitcoin Deposit Trend Continues, with CEX Net Inflow of 2,178.12 BTC in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 3rd, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of BTC on CEX exchanges was 2,178.12 BTC. The top three exchanges in terms of inflow volume are as follows:· Binance with a net inflow of 1,370.04 BTC;· OKX with a net inflow of 731.08 BTC;· Bitfinex with a net inflow of 564.15 BTC.In addition, Coinbase Pro witnessed a net outflow of 348.74 BTC and ranked first in the outflow list.

item.title: Trump Responds to "Death Rumors": Didn't See It
item.description: September 3rd: Regarding the "death hoax" about him, US President Trump stated, "I didn't see it."

item.title: Trump Appears on Live Camera at End of White House Press Conference, Dispelling Speculation About His Health
item.description: September 3rd. Towards the end of a White House press briefing, President Trump emerged on live camera to quash speculation regarding his health. During the first half of today's White House press briefing, live broadcasts from major U.S. mainstream media outlets like Fox News, NBC, CNBC, etc. presented the exterior of the White House without showing President Trump at the briefing. Recent social media has been in full swing with speculation about his health.

item.title: If Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative long liquidation strength of major CEXs will reach $1.53 billion.
item.description: On September 3rd, the cryptocurrency market remains on a downward trajectory. According to Coinglass data, in the event that Ethereum drops below $4200, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation in mainstream CEXs will reach $1.553 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum surges above $4400, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation in mainstream CEXs will reach $0.940 billion.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not precisely depict the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent clusters, that is, intensity. Consequently, the liquidation chart showcases the degree to which the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it attains a certain level. Higher "liquidation bars" indicate that when the price reaches that level, it will experience a more pronounced reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Trump: Losing the Tariff Appeal Would Be an Economic Disaster
item.description: On September 3rd, President Trump of the US stated that if he lost the tariff appeal, it would be an economic disaster. An "emergency meeting" is going to be held tomorrow regarding the tariff ruling.

item.title: Trump Shows Up at White House Press Briefing as Scheduled, But Does Not Appear on Camera Live
item.description: September 3rd. President Trump was present at the White House press briefing as scheduled at 2 a.m. today. It is noteworthy that up to now, live broadcasts from major U.S. media outlets such as Fox News, NBC, CNBC, etc., only display the exterior of the White House and have not shown Trump's attendance at the briefing.In recent days, there has been extensive speculation on social media regarding his health condition. On August 30th, Pence stated that if a "serious tragedy" were to occur to Trump, he would be prepared to assume the presidency. Subsequently, Pence mentioned that the 79-year-old Trump is in good health and, despite recent inquiries about his health, he still retains "remarkable energy."
